lines.text: I don't wanna scare anyone, but I'm gonna give it to you straight about Jason. His body was never recovered from the lake after he drowned. And if you listen to the old-timers in town, they'll tell you he's still out there, some sort of demented creature, surviving in the wilderness, full grown by now... stalking... stealing what he needs, living off wild animals and vegetation. Some folks claim they've even seen him, right in this area. The girl that survived that night at Camp Blood, that... Friday The 13th? She claimed she saw him. She disappeared two months later... vanished. Blood was everywhere. No one knows what happened to her. Legend has it that Jason saw his mother beheaded that night. Then, he took his revenge, a revenge he continued to seek if anyone ever enters his wilderness again. And, by now, I guess you all know we're the first to return here. Five years... five long years he's been dorment. And he's hungry. Jason's out there... watching... always on the prowl for intruders... ready to kill... ready to devour... thirsty for young blood.

[to Jeff and Sandra]
I told the others, they didn't believe me. You're all doomed. You're all doomed.
These kids smoke better dope than I do.

[to Scott]
I ought to let you hang, you pervert!

[to Scott who stepped into a trap]
Don't go anywhere.
Very funny.

[to Paul]
There is someone in this room.

[Jason, gets up to lunge at Paul]
Paul, there's someone, in this fucking room!
[last lines]
Paul? Paul? Where's Paul?
You're gonna have to keep your people away from that place, Holt. It's condemned. Next time I catch anybody over there, I'm gonna have to run 'em in.
Uh, he told us that...
I'll handle this, Jeff.
Might even get a warrant against you.
Oh, really?

[to Paul]
Look, Holt, people say that what you do with these kids is great. You got a good reputation. But if I was you, I'd have located in the next county. You're too close. Things have been quiet for five years and that's the way we want to keep it.
So do I, officer. So do I.
[to Jeff and Sandra]
You two, take off. We'll talk at dinner.
We'll never do it again, sir.
Thanks, Mr Holt.
You're not even going to reprimand them? No punishment? What kind of place is this?
Ginny?
Yes, Paul?
No seconds on dessert for Jeff and Sandra tonight.
[Scott steps into snare and ends up hanging]
AAAH! Help!
[Teri watches, shocked, as Scott swings back]
Goddamn that Paul, him and his wilderness bullshit!
What does the winner get?
What does the winner want?
Guess.
Oh my god, they're towing us!
Oh, shit. Ted I'll call you back!
[Hangs up the phone while he and Sandra try to flag down the truck]
Hey! This is my truck! This is my truck! *ASSHOLE* this is my truck!
[They chase the truck around the bend and hear laughter which causes them to stop]

[laughing]
Welcome to God's country!
Please help me!
